specialNarration:
In this game, you follow Allison as she recalls life events in a special
therapy from age four to seventy-four.

Hold any key to hold an opposite thought pattern in Ally's mind, filling the Slice
of Life Bar at that age of Allison's life.
This will direct her towards certain life choices.

Use the mouse to sweep Allison's
thoughts and keep those that you want her to keep in that slice of life.
Choose carefully and see a different ending.
